entry.data:
MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 30S
NORTHWEST WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS AROUND 16
NORTHWEST WINDS AROUND 15 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 25 MPH

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 30S
NORTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS AROUND 18
WEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH, BECOMING SOUTH AFTER MIDNIGHT

PARTLY SUNNY IN THE MORNING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY
NOT AS COOL WITH HIGHS AROUND 50
SOUTH WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS AROUND 40
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 50S

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS
LOWS IN THE LOWER 40S
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE MORNING, THEN MOSTLY SUNNY IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE MID 50S
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS AROUND 40
HIGHS IN THE MID 60S
